CompetitionExecution

Class FieldMap

  • java.lang.Object
    • CompetitionExecution.FieldMap

  • public class FieldMap
extends java.lang.Object
    This class serves as a helper for navigation; it will depict the competition field as 10*10 grids, and it will mark the prohibited area that robot should take a detour around, such as detected wooden blocks and a designated zone
    Author:
    joey
